posts.post_content: Looking to buy any Postcards of NY American/Highlander postcards. Any showing Hilltop park and/or players...........

Hi Gary, any chance you have any duos for sale. I have a nice Highlanders/Yankees collection of cards but have never seen the postcards you posted. I would be interested in obtain even 1-2 to add to my collection.
Thanks Larry

Larry,
Sorry, not for sale. When these both came up for sale, I didn't have the money? I asked the sellers if I can pay them off on time. I'm very happy to own them now.
